item.title: My first script autologin
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

Your right junkj, Clickmouse and Movemouse are also pretty detectable…
You should use MMouse and Mouse if your using SRL it’s rarely detectable…
And add spaces it makes it look nicer.
Also I put KeyDown(40) when it types the username so it.
I used the coords you used, so if it doesn’t click the coords it was suppose to then it’s not my fault.
And sonny_bill9 please don’t post in an out-dated topic.
Hopefully it will work.

~~

Script_Owned4

[code]{---------------->}
program autologin;
{<----------------}
{.include srl/srl.scar}

const
username =‘USERNAME’; //add your username
password =‘peepee’; //add your password

var
xrandom,yrandom:Integer;

procedure login;
begin
x:=468;
y:=291;
MMouse(x,y,xrandom,yrandom)
wait(1000);
Mouse(0, 0, 1, 1, true)
wait(1000);
Typesend(username)
KeyDown(40);
Typesend(password)
wait(1000);
x:=331;
y:=320;
Mouse(0, 0, 1, 1, true);
wait(1000);
Writeln(‘now logged in, hoped you enjoyed it!’)
Terminatescript;
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
SetUpSRL;
Cleardebug;
writeln(‘Logging in’)
login;
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: My first script autologin
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

hmm if you have srl
This is the script

{---------------->}
program autologin;
{<----------------}
{.include srl/srl.scar}

const
username ='y3ll0 sn0';  //add your username
password ='peepee';  //add your password

procedure login;
begin
Movemouse(468, 291)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(468, 291,true)
wait(1000);
Typesend(username)
wait(1000);
Movemouse(373, 274)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(373, 274,true)
wait(1000);
Typesend(password)
wait(1000);
Movemouse(331, 320)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(331, 320,true)
wait(1000);
Writeln('now logged in, hoped you enjoyed it!')
Terminatescript;
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
SetUpSRL;
Cleardebug;
writeln('Logging in')
login;
end.

if you dont have srl
then heres the other script

{---------------->}
program autologin;
{<----------------}

const
username ='y3ll0 sn0';  //add your username
password ='peepee';  //add your password

procedure login;
begin
Movemouse(468, 291)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(468, 291,true)
wait(1000);
sendkeys(username)
wait(1000);
Movemouse(373, 274)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(373, 274,true)
wait(1000);
sendkeys(password)
wait(1000);
Movemouse(331, 320)
wait(1000);
ClickMouse(331, 320,true)
wait(1000);
Writeln('now logged in, hoped you enjoyed it!')
Terminatescript;
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
Cleardebug;
writeln('Logging in')
login;
end.

A few more things that you didnt really do right
The comments after the pass and user and them arrows at the top must have a
“{” to keep typin notes or comments without them errors, put a “}” to stop typing notes or comments

or you can do this"//" to type stuff on one line

To download srl go here:
villu-reborn.com

Move mouse smooth is to dectable so i put move mouse

them wait times are to quick try putting them in seconds a.k.a 1000-infinity

Sometimes you put a until(false) before the end. but for this it has terminatescript;
Which stops the script where ever you put it!

At the end

ActivateClient;= activates the window that you put the crosshair on
Cleardebug;= clears debug box
setupSRL;= (only if you have srl) Sets Up SRL

Glad i can help

Read full topic

item.title: My first script autologin
item.dc:creator: @stupidgorge stupidgorge
item.description:
@stupidgorge wrote:

hi can u please tell me how i can make it better please[scar]---------------->
program autologin;
<----------------
const
username =’’;add ure username
password =’’;add ure password

begin
MoveMouseSmooth(468, 291)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(468, 291,true)
wait(500);
Sendkeys(username)
wait(500);
MoveMouseSmooth(373, 274)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(373, 274,true)
wait(500);
SendKeys(password)
wait(500);
MoveMouseSmooth(331, 320)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(331, 320,true)
wait(600);
end.[/scar]
